attributes.action: Make the streets safer at night in the UK
attributes.additional_details: People do not feel safe at night, when either walking down streets or alleyways. We have the ambition to make the government see that people want more police patrols at night and stop as many crimes that happening and make people feel safer! The use more streetlights would also make people feel safer so they can see the area around them. Street safety is extremely important. More is needed so people feel safe.
